title: Special Report: Inside Trump's election plot
description: Ari Melber hosts a special report that takes a unique look at the January 6th Committee’s findings to date, former President Trump’s actions as they unfolded in real time, and whether the President may have crossed a legal line.
author: multimedia@msnbc.com (MSNBC)
content:encoded: Ari Melber hosts a special report that takes a unique look at the January 6th Committee’s findings to date, former President Trump’s actions as they unfolded in real time, and whether the President may have crossed a legal line.
